definition_zh: 麻黄科植物草麻黄、中麻黄或木贼麻黄的草质茎
definition_en: The herbaceous stem of Ephedra sinica Stapf
contained_in_formula: 发汗解表;宣肺平喘;利水消肿

definition_zh: 樟科植物肉桂的干燥嫩枝
definition_en: The dried tender twig of Cinnamomum cassia (L.) J.Presl
has_function: 发汗解肌;温经通阳;助阳化气

definition_zh: 樟科植物肉桂的干燥嫩枝
definition_en: The dried tender twig of Cinnamomum cassia (L.) J.Presl
contained_in_formula: 发汗解肌|温经通阳|助阳化气
